entry.title: A Sense of Deja Vú
entry.summary:
Author: Chaos_Crew

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,301Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: Seventeen years ago the Hale Pack of Beacon Hills disappears without a trace after a house fire leaving the town to believe they had all suffered the same fate as the family fifteen years prior.Hearing the news of the house fire along with the weird accounts of "freak accidents" the Winchesters and Co. head to Beacon Hills to investigate.A few hours shortly after arriving a dog with to much human like qualities leads Dean to a baby abandoned in an alley.Seventeen years later that baby has grown a lot and is starting to witness the oddities of the towns supernatural accidently ending up back in time to the point where the Hale Pack is starting to find their footing after years of butting heads.

entry.title: DOUBLESPEAK & SUBTERFUGE
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,600Chapters: 1/18Kudos: 4

Summary: After a series of events are erased from public memory, Stiles returns to Beacon Hills Prep with a fractured reputation and a growing power. Meanwhile Scott is having trouble reconciling the pressure and expectations from his estranged fathers–Rafael–sudden return.As the school restructures and supernatural tensions rise, old alliances are tested, new leaders emerge, and hidden agendas begin to surface. With friendships strained and the political balance shifting, Stiles and Scott are drawn deeper into a world of rituals, legacy, and dangerous expectations. Stiles also begins training under a reluctant mentor when he uncovers truths about the past and his role in a future that others are quietly trying to shape.Meanwhile, forces inside and outside the school maneuver to gain control, and the line between protector and pawn begins to blur. When violence erupts and loyalties are tested, Stiles must decide who he is, who he stands with, and what he’s willing to become to survive what’s coming next.Some power is inherited. Some is stolen. But the most dangerous kind? The uncontrollable.

entry.title: This Is Not Me Falling for You (Except It Definitely Is)
entry.summary:
Author: Hathly

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,868Chapters: 3/12Kudos: 63

Summary: Stiles didn’t expect to see Derek Hale at college. Not after years of teenage antagonism, not after that one summer where Derek glared at him for breathing too loud. But suddenly Derek is here—older, hotter, and somehow the only person who knows Stiles’ schedule better than his own.Now they’re kind-of-maybe friends. If friends argued over superhero rankings, walked each other to class like it’s a rom-com, and accidentally held hands under the stars.

entry.title: The Phase That Pays
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,608Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 87

Summary: After the nogitsune, Stiles learned how to disappear quietly.In oversized clothes, empty laughter, and meals that end in cold porcelain, he unravels slowly—in corners no one looks at,in details no one knows how to name.The pack sees him.They just don’t know how to help.But Derek does.With glances that linger too long, with silences that speak louder than words,he starts picking up the pieces before Stiles even realizes he's breaking.This is a story about someone who’s forgotten how to exist—and someone who chooses to stay anyway.

entry.title: Just A Bit Broken
entry.summary:
Author: stereksupremacy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,325Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Derek-The moment my eyes see Stiles I knew he was mine. Now it was just a matter of letting him see we were basically meant for each other. It shouldn't be too hard... Or will it? With too many obstacles between us, his brother included, is my love enough to win him over? They say love is hard, but how hard is too much? It doesn't matter. I will keep trying and trying even if it breaks me little by little. Stiles deserves love, and I will be the one to give it to him.Stiles-My life was turned upside down the day of my sixth-grade graduation. It's a subject we don't want to talk about. Ever. From there, things just got worse, so now. New town, new me. I won't let anyone close to me. Everyone in the end just hurts me and I don't think my heart, or my mental health can handle any more betrayals. So when Derek comes knocking on my cold, dead heart, I have to build higher and stronger walls. Because truth be told, I don't think I can keep saying no to him. But I have to. No matter how charming he is. Or how funny. Or how insanely hot he is. He'll just end up hurting me. Like him. The one who shall not be named. I'm not made for love. I learned that the hard way. Derek will have too as well.

entry.title: On Blade's Edge
entry.summary:
Author: SterekoTypes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,806Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 367

Summary: “You are not a very good assassin. I expected more from the Argents than a doe-eyed street urchin.”The blade in the King’s hand wavered in the light. There was a triskele pressed into the hilt. A Hale. A King Hale. King Derek Hale. The Wolf King. Stiles shuddered.“I’m not. I-” Stiles couldn’t remember the last time he had been this shaken up. He took a half step back, but got tangled up in something on the ground. He flailed as he fell.

entry.title: Just Kids, Once
entry.summary:
Author: hubrys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,446Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 74

Summary: “You left. Just like that. No goodbyes. No nothing.”“Stiles, I—”“Don’t. You walked away, Derek. After everything. I needed you to stay.”“I didn’t know how.”“You weren’t the first to go. Maybe just the one I hoped wouldn’t.”_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________They grew up clinging to each other in a house that promised nothing. Years later, Stiles dances in a cage and Derek’s about to get married. Some stories don’t start with love. Some start when everything else has already fallen apart.

entry.title: Scar Tissue
entry.summary:
Author: Halevetica

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,843Chapters: 30/55Kudos: 369

Summary: Derek hasn't worked with a partner in years, it's easier to keep his secret if he's alone. However, a new case against a family he's been wanting to take down falls into his lap, only it comes with a catch, he must accept a new partner. He doesn't know if he can work with someone again. But he's desperate to take down the family that took everything from him. All he has to do is keep his new partner in the dark. But what if his new partner has a secret of his own?
